verses.verse: "Then <S%G5119><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> will be comparable <S%G3666><s%> to ten <S%G1176><s%> virgins, <S%G3933><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> their lamps, <S%G2985><s%> and went <S%G1831><s%> out to meet <S%G5222><s%> the bridegroom. <S%G3566><s%>
"And five <S%G4002><s%> of them were foolish, <S%G3474><s%> and five <S%G4002><s%> were prudent. <S%G5429><s%>
"For when the foolish <S%G3474><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> their lamps, <S%G2985><s%> they took <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> oil <S%G1637><s%> with them,
but the prudent <S%G5429><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> oil <S%G1637><s%> in flasks <S%G30><s%> along with their lamps. <S%G2985><s%>
"Now <S%G1161><s%> while the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> was delaying, <S%G5549><s%> they all <S%G3956><s%> got <S%G3573><s%> drowsy <S%G3573><s%> and [began] to sleep. <S%G2518><s%>
"But at midnight <S%G3319><s%> <S%G3571><s%> there was a shout, <S%G2906><s%> 'Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the bridegroom! <S%G3566><s%> Come <S%G1831><s%> out to meet <S%G529><s%> [him.']
"Then <S%G5119><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> virgins <S%G3933><s%> rose, <S%G1453><s%> and trimmed <S%G2885><s%> their lamps. <S%G2985><s%>

"And the foolish <S%G3474><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the prudent, <S%G5429><s%> 'Give <S%G1325><s%> us some <S%G1537><s%> of your oil, <S%G1637><s%> for our lamps <S%G2985><s%> are going <S%G4570><s%> out.'

"But the prudent <S%G5429><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'No, <S%G3379><s%> there will not be enough <S%G714><s%> for us and you [too;] go <S%G4198><s%> instead <S%G3123><s%> to the dealers <S%G4453><s%> and buy <S%G59><s%> [some] for yourselves. <S%G1438><s%>'

"And while they were going <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> to make <S%G59><s%> the purchase, <S%G59><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who were ready <S%G2092><s%> went <S%G1525><s%> in with him to the wedding <S%G1062><s%> feast; <S%G1062><s%> and the door <S%G2374><s%> was shut. <S%G2808><s%>

"And later <S%G5305><s%> the other <S%G3062><s%> virgins <S%G3933><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Lord, <S%G2962><s%> lord, <S%G2962><s%> open <S%G455><s%> up for us.'
"But he answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> 'Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, I do not know <S%G3609><s%> you.'
"Be on the alert <S%G1127><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> for you do not know <S%G3609><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> the hour. <S%G5610><s%>

"For [it is] just <S%G5618><s%> like <S%G5618><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> [about] to go <S%G589><s%> on a journey, <S%G589><s%> who called <S%G2564><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> slaves, <S%G1401><s%> and entrusted <S%G3860><s%> his possessions <S%G5225><s%> to them.

"And to one <S%G3739><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents, <S%G5007><s%> to another, <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1161><s%> two, <S%G1417><s%> and to another, <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1161><s%> one, <S%G1520><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his own <S%G2398><s%> ability; <S%G1411><s%> and he went <S%G589><s%> on his journey. <S%G589><s%>

"Immediately <S%G2112><s%> the one who had received <S%G2983><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> and traded <S%G2038><s%> with them, and gained <S%G2770><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> more <S%G243><s%> talents.
"In the same <S%G5615><s%> manner <S%G5615><s%> the one who [had received] the two <S%G1417><s%> [talents] gained <S%G2770><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> more. <S%G243><s%>

"But he who received <S%G2983><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> [talent] went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> and dug <S%G3736><s%> in the ground, <S%G1093><s%> and hid <S%G2928><s%> his master's money. <S%G694><s%>

"Now <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> a long <S%G4183><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> the master <S%G2962><s%> of those <S%G1565><s%> slaves <S%G1401><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and settled <S%G4868><s%> accounts <S%G3056><s%> with them.

"And the one who had received <S%G2983><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> up and brought <S%G4374><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> more <S%G243><s%> talents, <S%G5007><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Master, <S%G2962><s%> you entrusted <S%G3860><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> to me; see, <S%G2396><s%> I have gained <S%G2770><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> more <S%G243><s%> talents. <S%G5007><s%>'

"His master <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to him, 'Well <S%G2095><s%> done, <S%G2095><s%> good <S%G18><s%> and faithful <S%G4103><s%> slave; <S%G1401><s%> you were faithful <S%G4103><s%> with a few <S%G3641><s%> things, <S%G3641><s%> I will put <S%G2525><s%> you in charge <S%G2525><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> things, <S%G4183><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into the joy <S%G5479><s%> of your master. <S%G2962><s%>'

"The one <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> [had received] the two <S%G1417><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> up and said, <S%G3004><s%> 'Master, <S%G2962><s%> you entrusted <S%G3860><s%> to me two <S%G1417><s%> talents; <S%G5007><s%> see, <S%G2396><s%> I have gained <S%G2770><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> more <S%G243><s%> talents. <S%G5007><s%>'

"His master <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to him, 'Well <S%G2095><s%> done, <S%G2095><s%> good <S%G18><s%> and faithful <S%G4103><s%> slave; <S%G1401><s%> you were faithful <S%G4103><s%> with a few <S%G3641><s%> things, <S%G3641><s%> I will put <S%G2525><s%> you in charge <S%G2525><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> things; <S%G4183><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into the joy <S%G5479><s%> of your master. <S%G2962><s%>'

"And the one also <S%G2532><s%> who had received <S%G2983><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> talent <S%G5007><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> up and said, <S%G3004><s%> 'Master, <S%G2962><s%> I knew <S%G1097><s%> you to be a hard <S%G4642><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> reaping <S%G2325><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> you did not sow, <S%G4687><s%> and gathering <S%G4863><s%> where <S%G3606><s%> you scattered <S%G1287><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> [seed.]

'And I was afraid, <S%G5399><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> and hid <S%G2928><s%> your talent <S%G5007><s%> in the ground; <S%G1093><s%> see, <S%G2396><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> is yours. <S%G4674><s%>'

"But his master <S%G2962><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'You wicked, <S%G4190><s%> lazy <S%G3636><s%> slave, <S%G1401><s%> you knew <S%G3609><s%> that I reap <S%G2325><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I did not sow, <S%G4687><s%> and gather <S%G4863><s%> where <S%G3606><s%> I scattered <S%G1287><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> [seed.]

'Then <S%G3767><s%> you ought <S%G1163><s%> to have put <S%G906><s%> my money <S%G694><s%> in the bank, <S%G5133><s%> and on my arrival <S%G2064><s%> I would have received <S%G2865><s%> my [money] back <S%G2865><s%> with interest. <S%G5110><s%>

'Therefore <S%G3767><s%> take <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> the talent <S%G5007><s%> from him, and give <S%G1325><s%> it to the one who has <S%G2192><s%> the ten <S%G1176><s%> talents. <S%G5007><s%>'

"For to everyone <S%G3956><s%> who has <S%G2192><s%> shall [more] be given, <S%G1325><s%> and he shall have <S%G4052><s%> an abundance; <S%G4052><s%> but from the one who does not have, <S%G2192><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> he does have <S%G2192><s%> shall be taken <S%G142><s%> away. <S%G142><s%>

"And cast <S%G1544><s%> out the worthless <S%G888><s%> slave <S%G1401><s%> into the outer <S%G1857><s%> darkness; <S%G4655><s%> in that place <S%G1563><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall be weeping <S%G2805><s%> and gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>

"But when <S%G3752><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> in His glory, <S%G1391><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> with Him, then <S%G5119><s%> He will sit <S%G2523><s%> on His glorious <S%G1391><s%> throne. <S%G2362><s%>

"And all <S%G3956><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> will be gathered <S%G4863><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> Him; and He will separate <S%G873><s%> them from one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> as the shepherd <S%G4166><s%> separates <S%G873><s%> the sheep <S%G4263><s%> from the goats; <S%G2056><s%>
and He will put <S%G2476><s%> the sheep <S%G4263><s%> on His right, <S%G1188><s%> and the goats <S%G2055><s%> on the left. <S%G2176><s%>

"Then <S%G5119><s%> the King <S%G935><s%> will say <S%G3004><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> on His right, <S%G1188><s%> 'Come, <S%G1205><s%> you who are blessed <S%G2127><s%> of My Father, <S%G3962><s%> inherit <S%G2816><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> for you from the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

'For I was hungry, <S%G3983><s%> and you gave <S%G1325><s%> Me [something] to eat; <S%G2068><s%> I was thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> and you gave <S%G4222><s%> Me drink; <S%G4222><s%> I was a stranger, <S%G3581><s%> and you invited <S%G4863><s%> Me in;
naked, <S%G1131><s%> and you clothed <S%G4016><s%> Me; I was sick, <S%G770><s%> and you visited <S%G1980><s%> Me; I was in prison, <S%G5438><s%> and you came <S%G2064><s%> to Me.'

"Then <S%G5119><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> will answer <S%G611><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Lord, <S%G2962><s%> when <S%G4219><s%> did we see <S%G3708><s%> You hungry, <S%G3983><s%> and feed <S%G5142><s%> You, or <S%G2228><s%> thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> and give <S%G4222><s%> You drink <S%G4222><s%>?
'And when <S%G4219><s%> did we see <S%G3708><s%> You a stranger, <S%G3581><s%> and invite <S%G4863><s%> You in, or <S%G2228><s%> naked, <S%G1131><s%> and clothe <S%G4016><s%> You?
'And when <S%G4219><s%> did we see <S%G3708><s%> You sick, <S%G770><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> in prison, <S%G5438><s%> and come <S%G2064><s%> to You?'

"And the King <S%G935><s%> will answer <S%G611><s%> and say <S%G3004><s%> to them, 'Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, to the extent <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3745><s%> that you did <S%G4160><s%> it to one <S%G1520><s%> of these <S%G3778><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> of Mine, <S%G1473><s%> [even] the least <S%G1646><s%> [of them,] you did <S%G4160><s%> it to Me.'

"Then <S%G5119><s%> He will also <S%G2532><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> on His left, <S%G2176><s%> 'Depart <S%G4198><s%> from Me, accursed <S%G2672><s%> ones, into the eternal <S%G166><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> which has been prepared <S%G2090><s%> for the devil <S%G1228><s%> and his angels; <S%G32><s%>
for I was hungry, <S%G3983><s%> and you gave <S%G1325><s%> Me [nothing <S%G3756><s%>] to eat; <S%G2068><s%> I was thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> and you gave <S%G4222><s%> Me nothing to drink; <S%G4222><s%>

I was a stranger, <S%G3581><s%> and you did not invite <S%G4863><s%> Me in; naked, <S%G1131><s%> and you did not clothe <S%G4016><s%> Me; sick, <S%G772><s%> and in prison, <S%G5438><s%> and you did not visit <S%G1980><s%> Me.'

"Then <S%G5119><s%> they themselves <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> will answer, <S%G611><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Lord, <S%G2962><s%> when <S%G4219><s%> did we see <S%G3708><s%> You hungry, <S%G3983><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a stranger, <S%G3581><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> naked, <S%G1131><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> sick, <S%G772><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> in prison, <S%G5438><s%> and did not take <S%G1247><s%> care <S%G1247><s%> of You?'

"Then <S%G5119><s%> He will answer <S%G611><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, to the extent <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3745><s%> that you did <S%G4160><s%> not do <S%G4160><s%> it to one <S%G1520><s%> of the least <S%G1646><s%> of these, <S%G3778><s%> you did <S%G4160><s%> not do <S%G4160><s%> it to Me.'
"And these <S%G3778><s%> will go <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> into eternal <S%G166><s%> punishment, <S%G2851><s%> but the righteous <S%G1342><s%> into eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>"
